title: Design & Branding
description: Distinctive aesthetics, custom typography, and video support

requirements.title: Aesthetic guidelines in template
requirements.description: Template specification includes frontend_aesthetics block in description for design agents

validation.notes: Frontend aesthetics block implemented in api/templates/saas-landing-page.json:323-330 with style, colors, typography, layout, components, and animations guidelines

requirements.notes: Implemented: Comprehensive frontend_aesthetics block with guidelines for modern, bold, high-contrast design using custom typography, asymmetric layouts, and layered gradients

requirements.title: Custom typography
requirements.description: Default template declares custom font stack (not Inter, Roboto, Arial, or system default)

validation.notes: Space Grotesk font implemented in ui/src/styles.css:1

requirements.notes: Implemented: Space Grotesk custom font via Google Fonts (distinctive geometric sans-serif)

requirements.title: CSS theming
requirements.description: Template uses defined CSS variables for colors and spacing

validation.notes: CSS variables defined in ui/src/styles.css for colors, spacing, radius, and shadows

requirements.notes: Implemented: Comprehensive CSS custom properties (--color-*, --spacing-*, --radius-*, --shadow-*) for agent customization

requirements.title: Non-trivial backgrounds
requirements.description: Template includes at least one layered gradient/shape/texture background (not flat solid)

validation.notes: Layered mesh gradient (radial gradients + linear gradients) implemented in ui/src/styles.css:75 and used in PublicHome

requirements.notes: Implemented: Multi-layered gradient backgrounds (.bg-mesh-gradient, .bg-gradient-elevated) using radial and linear gradients

requirements.title: Video section support
requirements.description: Template supports at least one video demo section (URL, thumbnail, caption, layout) configurable via admin

validation.notes: VideoSection component with YouTube/Vimeo embed support, thumbnail overlay, and responsive layout

requirements.notes: Implemented: VideoSection component supports YouTube/Vimeo URLs, custom thumbnails with play button overlay, captions, and responsive iframe embedding. Database schema updated to include 'video' section type.
